News.headline: Loan Update 28th March
News.short_description: Loan update on Daggers loan players White, Heard, Hyde, Barnwell, Bloomfield and Shepherd
News.description:
Striker Joe White played for 89 minutes on Saturday in Wealdstone’s 2-1 away win over Bath City in the Vanarama National League South. White got the winning goal from the penalty spot after being brought down in the box as The Stones extended their unbeaten run to eleven games.

Scott Heard played the full 90 minutes for East Thurrock United in their 3-1 away win over Western-super-Mare on Saturday which left The Rocks eleventh in the table.

Midfielder Tyrique Hyde played the full 90 minutes for Ware FC on Saturday in their 2-1 away defeat to Heybridge Swifts in the Isthmian North Division leaving them in twenty second place in the table.

Shomari Barnwell got his first goals for Hastings United on Saturday getting himself two goals in three minutes as The Arrow’s put five past Molesey in the Isthmain South Division to put them sixth in the table.

Forward Mason Bloomfield got the winner for Aveley FC on Saturday in their 1-0 away win over Wroxham FC and played the full 90 minutes on Monday as The Millers drew 0-0 at home to Bury Town in the Isthmian North Division.

Defender Jimmy Shepherd made his debut for East Grinstead Town on Saturday as The Wasps fell to a disappointing 3-0 defeat away to Faversham in the Isthmain South Division.
